attributes.action: Replace the current penalty points system on motor vehicle driving licenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system of penalty points and fines do not adequately induce a cultural shift towards promoting road safety. We petition the prime minister to replace the current system with an additional license category ‘restricted’ which will expire in one year should the license holder fail to pass a driving test whilst in possession of a restricted license. If the license expires then the license holder may then apply for a provisional license and become a learner driver again. If a driving test is passed whilst on a restricted license then the driver may return to a full license.
A system of endorsements may still be retained for those who commit further offences whilst on a restricted licence. 
This is a system requiring the retesting of careless and dangerous drivers.
